metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17530 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** common/help.c in Geomview 1.9.5 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL. NOTE: this is disputed by a third party because no untrusted input can be used for the injection.

criterions.comment: geomview package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
